trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> é criado quando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event when it begins speaking a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento quando ele começa falando um prompt usando qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> classe não tem propriedades e não retorna dados a partir de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Ele é fornecido para habilitar os autores de aplicativos escrever manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.
